<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Iterator to traverse all successors of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> node.

This includes the entry node of VPRegionBlocks. Exit blocks of a region implicitly have their parent region&#39;s successors. This ensures all blocks in a region are visited before any blocks in a successor region when doing a reverse post-order

Definition at line 35 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplancfg-h">VPlanCFG.h</a>.

### SuccessorIdx {#a2261ace7cf11e6c598f9551d3bd830bf}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename BlockPtrTy&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>size&#95;t llvm::VPAllSuccessorsIterator&lt; BlockPtrTy &gt;::SuccessorIdx</>}>
Index of the current successor.

For <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpbasicblock">VPBasicBlock</a> nodes, this simply is the index for the successor array. For <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpregionblock">VPRegionBlock</a>, SuccessorIdx == 0 is used for the region&#39;s entry block, and SuccessorIdx - 1 are the indices for the successor array.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplancfg-h/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplancfg-h">VPlanCFG.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
